availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
29
The Governor appointed Dr Mat. Pyles Aid with the Rank of Colonel.
He approved an account of $24.40 to E H Toles for work done in Governor & Secretary's office: Also account of $40. to W. S. Sheperd for services at State arsenal all duly certified as correct.
He pardoned J. R. Isaacs convicted of the crime of Manslaughter by the Jackson Circuit Court and sentenced to three years confinement in the Penitentiary.
He remitted the following Judgments, to wit:

row.cell: Floyd Cir. Ct vs. Jonathan Jones

body.p: He approved and Signed enrolled Bills Chapters from 9 to 17 inclusive also enrolled Resolutions No 2 & 3.
